channel.title: Greeley Phone Cell Laptop on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Greeley Phone Cell Laptop on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Free WIFI in DIA
item.description: SO I take out my laptop to check my email using my phone.. and I for kicks turn on the wifi card to sniff around.. and much to my surprise I get a excellent wifi signal. so I type a web address and I get authenticated through att wireless “free” wifi service in airports. RULE. now it is time to look at some pron. haha. anyway.. I will be back to chitown soon.
